w:Form.p: Static controls are implementations of EditorOutput. Those components allow to bind data with an readonly state.

div.w:Heading: OutputText
div.p:
The OutputText is a simple text render. If tag attribute is not set, the text is wrapped in

tag. It also accept style attribute such as BADGE or LABEL.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:OutputText /> <w:OutputText style="BADGE" /> <w:OutputText tag="span" style="LABEL" /> <w:OutputText tag="div" style="LABEL_PRIMARY" /> <w:OutputText style="LABEL_SUCCESS" /> <w:OutputText style="LABEL_INFO" /> <w:OutputText style="LABEL_WARNING" /> <w:OutputText tag="footer" style="LABEL_DANGER" />

div.w:Heading: OutputNumber
div.p: The OutputNumber is an OutputText accepting custom number format.

div.w:Heading: OutputDate
div.p: The OutputDate is an OutputText accepting custom date format.

div.w:Heading: OutputEnum
div.p: The OutputEnum is an OutputText with an EnumRenderer generated with the MessageHelper

div.w:Heading: OutputBoolean
div.p: The OutputBoolean can customize the rendered value when true or false.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:OutputBoolean path="major" trueLabel="I am major" falseLabel="I am minor"/> <w:OutputBoolean path="notMajor" trueLabel="I am major" falseLabel="I am minor" />

div.w:Heading: OutputEmail
div.p: The OuputEmail wrapper the text mailto anchor.

div.w:Heading: OutputProgressBar
div.p: The OutputProgressBar render a number value on a graphical progress bar.

ul.li: color : color of the progress bar (DEFAULT, SUCCESS, INFO, WARNING, DANGER)
animated : Strip decoration animation, auto set striped attribute to true (default false)
min : min value is used to compute the percentage.
max : max value is used to compute the percentage.
format : is used to display value ({0} the value, {1} the percentage, {2} min value, {4} max value).
displayValue : displayValue if false the value is displayed for the screan readers in a hidden span.

w:OutputProgressBar.format: the value is {0} on {3} so the progress is {1} percent

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:OutputProgressBar /> <w:OutputProgressBar color="SUCCESS"/> <w:OutputProgressBar striped="true" max="200" color="INFO"/> <w:OutputProgressBar animated="true" color="WARNING" /> <w:OutputProgressBar min="-10" max="150" color="DANGER" />

div.w:Heading: OutputList
div.p: The OutputList render Collection in list. For each value it will generate a new EditorOutput. If the EditorOutput is not specified, the OuputList guess the output editor with the property type.

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:OutputList path="groups" type="INLINE" /> <w:OutputList path="groups" type="LIST" /> <w:OutputList path="groups" type="LIST_GROUP"/> <w:OutputList path="emails"> <w:OutputEmail /> </w:OutputList>
